content: --भग {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} very fortunate or prosperous, happy, blessed. highly favoured. {2} lovely, charming, beautiful, pretty; न तु ग्रीष्मस्यैवं सुभगमपराद्धं युवतिषु <ls>Ś. 3. 9</ls>; <ls>Ku. 4. 34</ls>, <ls>R. 11. 80</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9.</ls> {3} pleasant, grateful, agreeable, sweet; श्रवणसुभग <ls>M. 3. 4</ls>, <ls>Ś. 1. 3.</ls> {4} beloved, liked, amiable, dear; सुमुखि सुभगः पश्यन् स त्वामुपैतु कृतार्थतां <ls>Gīt. 5.</ls> {5} illustrious. (--गः {1} borax. {2} the Aśoka tree. {3} the Champaka tree. {4} red amaranth. (--गं good fortune.
